title: Google\Cloud\Language\LanguageClient
name: LanguageClient
description: Google Cloud Natural Language provides natural language understanding technologies to developers, including sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and syntax analysis. Currently only English, Spanish, and Japanese textual context are supported. Find more information at the Google Cloud Natural Language docs.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: config.projectId
params.description: The project ID from the Google Developer's Console.

params.name: config.authCache
params.description: A cache for storing access tokens. Defaults to a simple in memory implementation.

params.name: config.authCacheOptions
params.description: Cache configuration options.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests. Only valid for requests sent over REST.

params.name: config.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developer's Console. Ex: json_decode(file_get_contents($path), true).

params.name: config.keyFilePath
params.description: The full path to your service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: config.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

methods.name: analyzeEntities
methods.description: Finds named entities (currently finds proper names) in the text, entity types, salience, mentions for each entity, and other properties in the document.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to analyze. May be either a string of UTF-8 encoded content, a URI pointing to a Google Cloud Storage object in the format of gs://{bucket-name}/{object-name} or a Google\Cloud\Storage\StorageObject.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.detectGcsUri
params.description: When providing $content as a string, this flag determines whether or not to attempt to detect if the string represents a Google Cloud Storage URI in the format of gs://{bucket-name}/{object-name}. Defaults to true.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The document type. Acceptable values are PLAIN_TEXT or HTML. Defaults to "PLAIN_TEXT".

params.name: options.language
params.description: The language of the document. Both ISO (e.g., en, es) and BCP-47 (e.g., en-US, es-ES) language codes are accepted. If no value is provided, the language will be detected by the service.

params.name: options.encodingType
params.description: The text encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets. Acceptable values are "NONE", "UTF8", "UTF16" and "UTF32". Defaults to "UTF8". Please note the following behaviors for the encoding type setting: "NONE" will return a value of "-1" for offsets. "UTF8" will return byte offsets. "UTF16" will return code unit offsets. "UTF32" will return unicode character offsets.
